venue.name: On The Border Mexican Grill & Cantina

item.description:
If you've never come up to Wedeln nor stayed at one of the other ski clubs, this event is for you!

Please come to Woburn to discover more about Wedeln and the other ski clubs in the Mount Washington Valley! We are all associated with EICSL!

Incorporated in 1953, the Eastern Inter-Club Ski League (EICSL) promotes recreational skiing, boarding and racing at the amateur and club level. We are an organization of ski clubs of New Hampshire and Massachusetts, most with ski lodges in the Mount Washington Valley area. The clubs offer year-round sporting and social activities individually and through the league in addition to skiing and winter outings. There are a wide variety of membership options available for singles, couples and families among the clubs. Members benefits include discounts on lift tickets, food, clothing, equipment and travel not only though EICSL, but through our membership in the National Ski Council Federation.
EICSL website


Founded in 1961, the Wedeln Ski Club offers an all season retreat for winter sports; skiing, snowboarding, skating and climbing. Or off winter sports such as golf, biking, hiking and kayaking. We are a not for profit organization, organized for and run by our members. Our philosophy has always been about having fun and meeting new people! We know we are the best ski club in the valley! Come join us!
Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a large group of ski clubs represented - come find Wedeln and me.
item.name: Getting to Know EICSL (Eastern Inter-Club Ski League) and Wedeln!
